data.description:
# Are you ready to start your KUNG FU FITNESS journey today?

With a focused mind and a strong body, embark on the challenge to become the greatest Kung Fu master of all time! Join **Crazy Kung Fu** to start your training, improve your reflexes, get fit, and become the ultimate Kung Fu force!

![{"height":430,"type":"image","width":1896}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974734_442371268304638_2076364694493558765_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_l1JxkFoFY0Q7kNvgH5oNdT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCtfnSSlfifxkz9RqcSYRGt3t3uC1LQm5BnBLaPSI70_Q&oe=66683111)

It won’t be easy, so keep your wits about you! As you climb the ranks and master new techniques, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges that will push you to your limits—and help you discover new limits you didn’t know you had! You’ll grow stronger and healthier, move on instinct, and anticipate the action ahead of time—you’ll be unstoppable!

![{"height":430,"type":"image","width":1896}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974901_1827166471119376_6038818594329039491_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KgEa0vZUhV4Q7kNvgETzcAX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBtwgRGBEf4c1-_m53qXkyiTH2WorPXfRl-esYChQDtPw&oe=666828E5)

# KEY FEATURES
- **Multiplayer:** compete with other players worldwide!
- Use your hands and body to engage in unique reflex-based gameplay that will get your heart rate up and teach you new skills.
- Embark across 72 levels and 4 game modes, with high-level challenges and gameplay modifiers.
- See how well you performed after each level, with statistics on your range and accuracy, as well as your punch, dodge, and block counts. Target your weaknesses to push towards victory!
- Train in 6 stunning environments, including your own dojo and a tranquil bamboo forest, each with their own original and immersive soundtracks!
- Unlock new locations, bracers, achievements, and challenges.
- Challenge your friends and watch yourself climb up the live leaderboards as you play.
- Enjoy 90Hz (Quest 2/3).

![{"height":430,"type":"image","width":1896}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974714_911325524075915_1230125792152387672_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KeMFkF6SnC4Q7kNvgHbSpOx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBH4v8Gfi7xNQWBjF0Qd4BXiO5OA81HydzGK6VjOOMh5Q&oe=6668489B)

changelog.change_log:
v1.2.8
- Fixed issue with progress not being saved in same instances.
- Fixed issue with global leaderboard being scrambbled in some instances.
- Fixed a rare issue where if the Meta menu was opened or the HMD removed during a scene initialising (takes less than a second) saves could be corrupted.

v1.2.7
- Fixed issue where statistics didn't load at the end of WORKOUT.
- Fixed issue where no text would appear on any boards in the game in some instances.
- Added health and safety message during loading to remind you to be aware of your surroundings while training! :)

v1.2.8
- Fixed issue with progress not being saved in same instances.
- Fixed issue with global leaderboard being scrambbled in some instances.

v1.2.7
- Fixed issue where statistics didn't load at the end of WORKOUT.
- Fixed issue where no text would appear on any boards in the game in some instances.
- Added health and safety message during loading to remind you to be aware of your surroundings while training! :)

- Fixed issue where statistics didn't load at the end of WORKOUT.
- Fixed issue where no text would appear on any boards in the game in some instances.

v1.2.3 - Hotfix

- Fixed issue where when selecting a message to send in multiplayer the button wouldn't highlight.
- Added ability to fist bump other players in multiplayer? See what happens!
- Smoothed out logic for when players join and leave sessions, how the session list refreshes and how the session is reset when you are host and the other player left/rejoined.

v1.2.2 - Year of the Dragon update !

- Added free Dragon themed mask: Guardian.
- Added free Dragon themed Bracers: Crimson.
- Fixed issue where in some instances in Train Tier 3 stats would displaying many more mistakes than you had actually made. Sorry about that! (Thanks to Zorro and The_Raven_Child).
- Fixed a similar issue where in some instances stats would display more total appeared punches/blocks than had actually appeared during the level. Making it impossible to get 100%! 
- Removed the ankward ending to levels when the dummy arms are no longer interactable on the last few seconds as it cools down.
- Revised some logic in the multiplayer session list so that when a session is available/unavailable the list updates much faster.
- Various other quality of life improvements, small things but still important.

Year of the Dragon update !

- Added free Dragon themed mask: Guardian.
- Added free Dragon themed Bracers: Crimson.
- Fixed issue where in some instances in Train Tier 3 stats would displaying many more mistakes than you had actually made. Sorry about that! (Thanks to Zorro and The_Raven_Child).
- Fixed a similar issue where in some instances stats would display more total appeared punches/blocks than had actually appeared during the level. Making it impossible to get 100%! 
- Removed the ankward ending to levels when the dummy arms are no longer interactable on the last few seconds as it cools down.
- Revised some logic in the multiplayer session list so that when a session is available/unavailable the list updates much faster.
- Various other quality of life improvements, small things but still important.

This update has been possible thanks to all of you who have filed bug reports in Discord and helped me track down how to fix them. Teamwork is at the very essence of Kung Fu, so thank you.

Gameplay:
- Fixed issue where mistakes would appear at the start of a level, and failure could happen immediately due to them. (Thanks to Saquial & Duckdoc)
- Removed exploit where you could gain additional points from hitting the center pad in Train after the level ended if that was the last dummy arm on level end. (Thanks to Dgtlhrt)
- Fixed issue with Accuracy percentage going above 100% in some instances, even though that's pretty awesome let's be honest. (Thanks to The_Raven_Child).
- Fixed issue with feedback text being very right hand focused. The feedback should be more accurate now, covering a range for both hands, arms, too soon, late and perfect rounds. (Thanks to The_Raven_Child).

Menu/Visual:
- Fixed issue in achievements menu where if you went to the last page and closed/reopened the Achievements menu the navigational arrow would be wrong, resulting in not being able to browse achievements anymore. (Thanks to Archangel).
- Fixed various spelling mistakes accross the game. (Thanks to Archangel).
- Fixed issue where EVENT would unlock before 3 levels of both TRAIN and FIGHT had been completed. (Thanks to Archangel).

Achievements:
- Fixed issue with achievements where Destiny, Eternity and Crazy would not unlock. (Thanks to Archangel).
- Fixed issue with achievements where they would not unlock at the end of the level when they were completed, but instead would unlock after another level is played afterwards. (Thanks to Archangel).

IAPs:
- Fixed issue where purchased IAPs would not appear in the MY DOJO categories. (Thanks to Ninjaburr

V1.2: Christmas update!

- New mod: NO REGEN.
- New Multiplayer menu: you can now change cosmetics during multiplayer.
- Free Xmas themed matching mask and bracers!
- Fixed issue with tally for calories, punches, blocks and dodges not resetting each day.
- Various quality of life improvements.

- Updated multiplayer matchmaking backend to help find (when possible) players of similar skill. This works cross-platform, so you might find users from different platforms. The leaderboards are not crossplatform though. More platforms are being added as well, so expect an increase in players to match against!
- Updated multiplayer networking logic for a smoother experience overall, especially those with slower internet connections.
- Improved multiplayer collision detection and physics, which may change the scoring slightly in some instances. We're still in beta! (for now)
- Various smaller bug fixes overall. Thanks to everyone who has been helping find and squash them!

Now back to training!

- Updated multiplayer matchmaking backend to help find (when possible) players of similar skill. This works cross-platform, so you might find users from different platforms. The leaderboards are not crossplatform though. More platforms are being added as well, so expect an increase in players to match against!
- Updated multiplayer networking logic for a smoother experience overall, especially those with slower internet connections.
- Improved multiplayer collision detection and physics, which may change the scoring slightly in some instances. We're still in beta! (for now)
- Various smaller bug fixes overall. Thanks to everyone who has been helping find and squash them!

Now back to training!

- New mask: Furtive!
- Added spatial sound to arrows mod! (About time)
- Fixed issue with leaderboard stuck in a loading loop on Fight Level 8.
- Fixed issue with localization text not loading on Fight Weekly leaderboard.
- Fixed wrong music playing when joining a session in some instances.

v1.1
- MULTIPLAYER: Engage in thrilling 1-minute rounds against other players. Be the first to win 3 rounds to claim victory.
- WEEKLY LEADERBOARDS: Most of the game modes now have weekly leaderboards, so stay active to stay on top!
- MASK COSMETICS: Show off your unique look in multiplayer with the introduction of cosmetic MASKS.
- PERFORMANCE BOOST: Owners of Quest 2, Quest 3, and Pro models can now enjoy a performance upgrade, making your gameplay smoother than ever!
- LIGHTNING FAST: For those looking to amp up their workouts, the SPEED setting in the WORKOUT FLOW is now even faster, giving you a thrilling challenge!
- SHORTCUT TO SUCCESS: Get to your MY DOJO in a flash with a handy shortcut button from game mode pages. 
- FEEL THE KUNG FU: bHaptics has been updated to v2, and redesigned from the ground up. Expect more haptic variety now depending on the dummy arms you hit and with which part of your body!

v1.1
- MULTIPLAYER: Engage in thrilling 1-minute rounds against other players. Be the first to win 3 rounds to claim victory.
- WEEKLY LEADERBOARDS: Most of the game modes now have weekly leaderboards, so stay active to stay on top!
- MASK COSMETICS: Show off your unique look in multiplayer with the introduction of cosmetic MASKS.
- PERFORMANCE BOOST: Owners of Quest 2, Quest 3, and Pro models can now enjoy a performance upgrade, making your gameplay smoother than ever!
- LIGHTNING FAST: For those looking to amp up their workouts, the SPEED setting in the WORKOUT FLOW is now even faster, giving you a thrilling challenge!
- SHORTCUT TO SUCCESS: Get to your MY DOJO in a flash with a handy shortcut button from game mode pages. 
- FEEL THE KUNG FU: bHaptics has been updated to v2, and redesigned from the ground up. Expect more haptic variety now depending on the dummy arms you hit and with which part of your body!
